title: RADS Error: Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your Internet connection is...

replies.body: Sometimes that RADS error can mean that your OS doesn't have the right permissions in place to let League launch normally. Let's make sure to check up on those [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as well, and let me know if that does the trick!
Thank you! It did solve my problem{{summoner:31}} , so i guess anyone who has the same issue should try to reinstall the game as administrator!
